faction.name: DysonPrecursors
faction.description:
A (relatively) small Dyson Mothership is scouring the galaxy looking for resources. It appears weak, but whoes to say what would happen if this ship manages to achieve its goal?
This Mothership will work to gather resources and rebuild Zenith control over the galaxy, completely consuming Metal Generators to produce Dyson Nodes to secure territory it considers its own. Time will tell if you'll have a place in this new Zenith takeover.
<color=#f25e1c>HIGH IMPACT:</color> This faction can permanently modify the galaxy, capable of bringing intense pressure to planets and semi-permanently removing resources from planets.

custom_field.name: Intensity
custom_field.description: Just how effective is this faction?

custom_field.name: DebugMode
custom_field.description: Enables debug mode, cutting leveling and building costs by 90%. Development only

faction.name: DysonProtectors
faction.description: A subfaction of the Dyson Precursors, these are given various tasks related to protecting territory. Unlike Suppressors, these are willing to allow the existence of aliens, and are non-hostile to Humans.

faction.name: DysonSuppressors
faction.description: A subfaction of the Dyson Precursors, these are given various tasks related to suppressing territory. Unlike Protectors, these will not allow the existence of aliens, and are hostile to Humans.
